metadata.title: Loot Weapon Mine!
metadata.author: Codex
metadata.description:
Buy exactly one loot item (weapon or drone) per run from the Storage menu.
- Accessible from the Storage button any time it's available - Costs scrap equal to the blueprint's listed price (no freebies) - After purchase, the locker seals and the option disables for the run
Requirements & load order: - Requires FTL: Multiverse + Hyperspace - Patch after Multiverse; compatible with Judge Boon Selector
